xwikidoc.title: LoadService
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} #set($sessionId= $request.sessionId) #if("$!sessionId" != "") #if(!$sessionId.startsWith('MailArchivePrefs.LoadingSession_')) #set($sessionId = "MailArchivePrefs.LoadingSession_${sessionId}") #end #set($result = $services.mailarchive.session($sessionId).loadMails()) Result of loading session $sessionId : $result #else Add parameter "sessionId=<id>" to this page URL to trigger loading of session with id <id>. #end {{/velocity}}
